Ã‚Â· When you have a call, just shake and take.
Ã‚Â· If you press volume-up key, next music is played.(volume-down key is prev.)

Ã‚Â· Just Shake can be killed by Task Killer app. so you must except Just Shake from kill list of Task Killer Apps.(but Call Related Feature is never killed)
